item.title: Opinion Poll by Tecnè for Agenzia Dire, 29–30 October 2025 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partito Democratico (S&D): 16–20 seats
  • Movimento 5 Stelle (GUE/NGL): 8–11 seats
  • Italia Viva (RE): 0 seats
  • Più Europa (RE): 0 seats
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 6–10 seats
  • Azione (RE): 0–4 seats
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 23–28 seats
  • Sinistra Italiana (GUE/NGL): 1–3 seats
  • Lega Nord (PfE): 6–8 seats
  • Europa Verde (Greens/EFA): 2–4 seats
  • Partito Progressista (*): 0–1 seats
